org.jgentleframework.configure
Interface BindingConfig

All Superinterfaces:
CoreBinding
All Known Subinterfaces:
Configurable
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractConfig, Binder, BindingConfigImpl, RmiService, WebAbstractConfig
public interface BindingConfig
extends CoreBinding

BindingConfig interface provides all methods need to perform binding. It offers some tools in order to bind a class type to an implementation class, and some programmatic tools to create a customized Definition of bean.

Author:
LE QUOC CHUNG - mailto: skydunkpro@yahoo.com

refMapping

java.lang.String refMapping()
Refers to an instance bound to mapping type. This method is only used when binding bean by CoreBinding.bind() method and its overloadings. In other cases, using this method is the cause of unforeseen exceptions.

refMapping

java.lang.String refMapping(java.lang.Class<?> clazz)
Refers to an instance bound to the given type.

Parameters:
clazz - the given type

refMapping

Refers to an instance bound to given mapping name.

Parameters:
mappingName - name of specified mapping.
